title: T206 Davidson SGC Fair, nice card for grade
author: GrayGhost

posts.post_title: T206 Davidson SGC Fair, nice card for grade
posts.post_content:
Blazing green card on Front, circular paper loss on back and light staining, prob from a glue card. SGC Fair, very presentable card w/out the bad loss of paper u usually see on lower graded cards. 

30.00 shipped on this card. PM reserve. pp gift preferred. Thanks. Scott.
I will also accept 20 in cash and some trade, like another T206 in lower grade, tho not destroyed, if possible. THANKS ALL. :)
Lowered price. cash/trade option still open. nice card
